Description

Buffalo Revive Sports Drink

4 flavors and colors: Apple Kiwi (Green), Fitness Orange (Orange), Cool Blue (Blue), Flow Red (Red)

Size: 500 ml Bottle

Serving size 1 bottle per person

Made in Germany

Powered by Switzerland

Ingredients

  • Natural Mineral Water, Fuctose syrup, acidifier citric acid,

  • acidity regulator trisodium citrate, natural flavouring,

  • perservative E202, stabilisers E414 and E445,

  • Colouring concentrate from safflower,

  • sweeteners sodium cyclamate, acesulfame K and sodium

  • saccharine; colour E133
